capability.name: Servicing Activity Analysis
capability.definition: This service domain analyzes servicing activity to support continual service improvement
capability.role: Analyze customer servicing position activity, including teller, case/contact center traffic and VoIP activity. Analysis includes captured call/channel/device type, activity, onward routing and resolution decisions for operational and procedural insights and facility/process and training improvement (Root Cause Analysis)
capability.example: Contact center management reviews servicing activity analysis in order to identify areas where additional training and guidance is needed to improve the customer experience

key_features.name: Analyze servicing activity for root causes
key_features.description: Enables analyze servicing activity for root causes to support this service domain analyzes servicing activity to support continual service improvement

key_features.name: Consolidate and present data to support analysis
key_features.description: Enables consolidate and present data to support analysis to support this service domain analyzes servicing activity to support continual service improvement

key_features.name: Recommend remedial actions that might mitigate the root cause for detected issues
key_features.description: Enables recommend remedial actions that might mitigate the root cause for detected issues to support this service domain analyzes servicing activity to support continual service improvement
